parameters.name: virtualInterfaceId
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual interface.

nested_items.name: vendor
nested_items.description: The vendor for the virtual interface's router.

nested_items.name: xsltTemplateName
nested_items.description: The template for the virtual interface's router.

nested_items.name: xsltTemplateNameForMacSec
nested_items.description: The MAC Security (MACsec) template for the virtual interface's router.

nested_items.name: routerTypeIdentifier
nested_items.description: Identifies the router by a combination of vendor, platform, and software version. For example, CiscoSystemsInc-2900SeriesRouters-IOS124.

nested_items.name: virtualInterfaceId
nested_items.description: The ID assigned to the virtual interface.

nested_items.name: virtualInterfaceName
nested_items.description: Provides the details about a virtual interface's router.
